profile.name: Sen-Pan Yang
profile.profile: As a skilled software engineer, I have a proven track record in debugging, code reading, and website design. Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a strong ability to solve complex technical problems, improve code performance, and implement innovative solutions. I am highly motivated to continue developing my IT skills and leveraging my technical expertise to benefit other people and organizations.
